title: Rachel Is Back! The Hosts Discuss the Pressure to Be Perfect and Their Favorite Things About Each Other
description:
Rachel Is Back! The Hosts Discuss the Pressure to Be Perfect and Their Favorite Things About Each Other 

Rachel Lindsay is back in the co-host seat this week, and she and Becca are diving into some fan questions. They address everything from the pressure to be perfect after coming off of reality TV to whether or not Becca would let Rachel set her up on a date. 

Plus, Rachel gives an update on what’s going on in her life, including Bryan’s plans to move to L.A. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode. 

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/bachelorhappyhour.

Thanks to our sponsors: 

Skout’s Honor: SkoutsHonor.com/bachelor 

Rothy’s: Rothys.com/BHH 

Pretty Litter: PrettyLitter.com  code Bachelor
